code: import React from'react';import{Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../contexts/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProtectedRoute=_ref=>{let{children,requiredRole}=_ref;const{isAuthenticated,user,loading}=useAuth();if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"Loading..."});}if(!isAuthenticated){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login",replace:true});}if(requiredRole&&(user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.role)!==requiredRole){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/dashboard",replace:true});}return children;};export default ProtectedRoute;
